c.c: For every course an index is automatically generated if at least on entry was specified.
To create an entry in the index a position in the text needs to be marked.

c: This sentence contains an entry for the [index]{data-index-term="index"}.

c.c: This sentence contains an entry for the
The entry itself is not recognizable in the text. The word or phrase needs to be appended with an attribute
. The value of this attribute is the term as it appears in the index. Naturally any number of references can exist for a single index term.
